title: ePythia To Do List | Task List
creator: ePythia Corporation

extendedInfo.description: ePythia is a free & simple To Do List.It uses your location to remind you about your tasks at the Right Place and or at the Right Time.And you can easily add a task to your to do list by voice! Just say, for example, "Call Mike tomorrow at 7" and the task will be automatically created with a reminder on that day and time!With ePythia task manager, you'll never forget your errands on the go: â¢ Buy groceriesâ¢ Pick up dry cleaningâ¢ Take anything important from Home or Workâ¢ Talk to your relative, colleague, friendâ¢ Get cash at any drive-by ATMYou can use ePythia to do list to wake yourself up when you are on a train so that you do not miss your station or just to remind to try again that amazing cake next time you are at your favorite cafe. Just pin your task to a place and receive a notification when you are around that place!Other features:â¢ Login with your Google, Facebook or Twitter account.â¢ Ability to add locations to Favorite Places to be able then to quickly create tasks with reminders at these locations.â¢ Integration with PointsâOfâInterests database (Google Places) to easy find the closest Wal-Mart or Best Buy store and to set a task with a location reminder at these points.â¢ "Radar" screen to see tasks closest to your current location.You can use ePythia's web-client (www.epythia.com) to manage your tasks from your computer.  Your tasks are always synchronized between the web-interface and the android application.We are constantly looking to improve our application and if you have ideas, suggestions or found bugs please do let us know through any available channel â our web-site, feedback system incorporated into our application or simply send us an email at feedback@epythia.com!

reviews.title: simple interface, very good
reviews.comment: very easy to use, nice interface and the web site is great. but need a little bit of work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bloody Good Stuff!
reviews.comment: Is very good. Sent feedback with ten suggestions. I believe thus great app can become even better! Thank you! (note: have not tested integration to Gmail / ePythia website interface)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cant save task or location
reviews.comment: Seems like a great app but there is. Button to save or add task or chosen location, when i hit menu (add task choose location page) it opens but is blank..tried hitting back button doesnt add. Im using the asus transformer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good but..
reviews.comment: Nice app and the location reminders are great, but to save a location or a task you have to press two buttons, menu then save (galaxy s3).fix this and I\'ll update my rating
reviews.author: George Broadbent

reviews.title: Nice, but need to improve a lot.
reviews.comment: Nice concept, UI, etc. But it keeps asking for login frequently. Also, it runs slowly on my phone, but that\'s my phone\'s problem. Otherwise, awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally....
reviews.comment: I need to be able to search for Places.... Like \"Home Depot\" and have a reminder set to pick up something next time I am near Home Depot.  None of the other aps I have tried allowed for this.  Finally, this one does.    I wish it synced with My Saved Places on Google Maps!  I use Google Maps for work and have all of my customers already saved.  It would be nice NOT to have to add them into yet another map.  It would be nice if I could search my customers and have a reminder added to tell Mrs Smith something next time I am at her property.  Or remind me to complete such and such a task next time I am in Mr. Jones\' neighborhood.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not able to scroll down for more feature
reviews.comment: The UI completely good but the content are not able to getting in my Galaxy Y phone need scroll to get more content in the task creating/editing time. If the content not fit into the screen for small screen my screen size 240x320 waiting for this update feature. Its simple and easy also I\'ll giving you 4 star when you implementing the scroll definitely giving you 5 star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great idea, lousy in practice, so sucks!!
reviews.comment: there\'s a great need for location-based tasks managers, since Any.Do lacks that feature, but this totally sucks. It fails at the important function of being able to reliably set location -- tried multiple times but wouldn\'t save location, then when checking it wouldn\'t save the task -- so, overall, it\'s not fit for purpose, and the programming is clearly beyond the dev as he hasn\'t bothered to issue updates / bug fixes since very early this year -- current rating is overly generous for an app that fails its very first purpose -- thank God, it\'s free, but it should be taken off the market till the dev can make it work -- turns out the website couldn\'t even find me on the map, so that might explain things, but it still fails at its \"purpose\"
reviews.author: Russell Wilson

reviews.title: Beautiful work!
reviews.comment: The interface of this app is second to none!!  Devs, can you please include an option for the reminder to be triggered when leaving a location instead of arriving? Thanks :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Nice interface, but I can\'t seem to be able to reliably assign a location to a task.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not connected
reviews.comment: I can\'t sign up or in. .. And no offline service...!!!
reviews.author: mustafa saad

reviews.title: Impressive and simple interface.
reviews.comment: --- Now its Free to All --- Out of all reminder and location reminder apps this took my attention immediatly... Has very ability to grow populat and place improvement as well. Five stars from me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best app in this category!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wouldn\'t sync up to my Google tasks
reviews.comment: Looks like it have limited capability.
reviews.author: Carey Lynch

reviews.title: Great concept, but unreliable
reviews.comment: What a fantasic concept! The only problem is that it only works when it wants to, and I have to set it for specfic places, instead of being able to set it for a chain (i.e. Pick up shampoo at Target, any Target). Ahh well. Maybe in a couple of updates I will try again! HTC EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SPYWARE
reviews.comment: Requires Facebook sign in and closely tracks everything you do for monetization of your life. Not for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: But there should be a widget otherwise everything fine...would have given 5 star if it had a widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Google Task Synch Please
reviews.comment: When can we have Google Task Synch?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Battery drainer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User
